attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.echo-news.co.uk/news/local/display.var.2024247.0.court_orders_destruction_of_screwdriver.php#comments

I believe this screwdriver has to right to continue leading a useful existance. It was in no part responsible for this crime but has been singled out for the worst possible punishment. I would like to see this screwdriver rehabilitated back into society and continue to lead a useful crime free existance.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
